Articles.Content:
Hey Guys!

Just ordered and downloaded the game. Had played it a few times before, but after thinking about how much I\'d like to see this game go forward I decided that it was more than worth the donation to do just a small part in seeing this development thrive.

Thank you for making such an inventive and fun game. I look forward to being a member of this community :-)

Matt

hi and well come to the forum

(come and see us in the rp section we dont get out much )

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
